thread.title: TSB will be deploying a team of investigators to a helicopter accident near Paynton, Saskatchewan

author: cbs8
title: TSB will be deploying a team of investigators to a helicopter accident near Paynton, Saskatchewan
text:
Transportation Safety Board of Canada
WINNIPEG , Oct. 22, 2015 /CNW/ - The Transportation Safety Board of Canada (TSB) will be deploying a team of investigators to the site of a helicopter accident near Paynton, Saskatchewan . The TSB will gather information and assess the occurrence.
The TSB is an independent agency that advances transportation safety by investigating occurrences in the marine, pipeline, rail and air modes of transportation. It is not the function of the Board to assign fault or determine civil or criminal liability.
The TSB is online at www.bst-tsb.gc.ca . Keep up to date on the latest from the TSB through RSS , Twitter (@TSBCanada), YouTube and Flickr
